title: Bug 49890 Nio Selector issue on Linux platform
description: Bug 49890 Nio Selector issue on Linux platform Created attachment 25997 [details] NioEndpoint.java and a simple web application. Sometimes the server's CPU reaches 100% and stays at 100% until the server is restarted. This issue has been reproduced with Java versions 1.6.007, 1.6.018, and 1.6.021. It appears to be a duplicate of issue Bug 46373. The problem was fixed by the Jetty team: http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/JETTY937?focusedCommentId=168060&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:commenttabpanel. I have added some logging to NioEndpoint.java.
EB: This issue is never reproduced on the Windows platform.
SR: Attached files: NioEndpoint.7z (patched NioEndpoint.java with logging), web.7z (simple web application)
